timeline.bodyText:
Please add some java statement in front , at least i++; // TODO: do differently in future. This Check is only applicable to java files, as have to be placed under Treewalker module.
Please add example of Todo comment that default config will not catch like ` // todo: haha.   // Ok
timeline.author: romani

replies.bodyText: Ok i will change it and add example for OK state
replies.author: AmrDeveloper

revised_code.chunk:
diff --git a/src/main/java/com/puppycrawl/tools/checkstyle/checks/TodoCommentCheck.java b/src/main/java/com/puppycrawl/tools/checkstyle/checks/TodoCommentCheck.java index 1eb21c3cc..4e14708e9 100644 --- a/src/main/java/com/puppycrawl/tools/checkstyle/checks/TodoCommentCheck.java +++ b/src/main/java/com/puppycrawl/tools/checkstyle/checks/TodoCommentCheck.java @@ -53,7 +53,8 @@ import com.puppycrawl.tools.checkstyle.api.TokenTypes; * Example: *

* 
- * //TODO: ..... violation
+ * i++; // TODO: do differently in future   // violation
+ * i++; // todo: do differently in future   // OK
  *
*

* To configure the check for comments that contain {@code TODO} and {@code FIXME}:

timeline.author: romani
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -50,13 +50,26 @@ * <module name="TodoComment"/> * *

+ * Example: + *

+ * 
+ * //TODO: ..... violation
+ *
+ *

* To configure the check for comments that contain {@code TODO} and {@code FIXME}: *

* 
  * <module name="TodoComment">
  *   <property name="format" value="(TODO)|(FIXME)"/>
  * </module>
  *
+ *

+ * Example: + *

+ * 
+ * //TODO: ..... violation
+ * //FIXME: ..... violation

replies.bodyText: Ok  i will add two now
replies.author: AmrDeveloper

replies.bodyText: please do not reply "I will", please reply "done" ... to let me catch notification that your are ready for review.
replies.author: romani

* 
- * //TODO: ..... violation
+ * i++; // TODO: do differently in future   // violation
+ * i++; // todo: do differently in future   // OK
  *
*

* To configure the check for comments that contain {@code TODO} and {@code FIXME}:
